title: Laptop crash
body: So a few days ago my laptop did a system update. Ever since then everything but league works perfectly. The second the game actually starts, like I'm at the fountain, it crashes my entire laptop and I have to take my battery out just to get it to turn off. Nothing else is broken on my laptop at all. I tried re downloading league. I uninstalled the update. What else is there to do especially since everything else works perfectly and now I have a 20 minute wait ban because your game thinks I'm quitting when it's actually destroying my laptop.

replies.body:
I had the same problem with the new Windows 10 update!

if you right click the League application and select "Test Compatibility" it will run a diagnostic and fix the problem for you!

:)

A recent Windows 10 update has been causing a crashing issue for some players.  The culprit appears to be a problem with the [Xbox Game Bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html).  Disabling that should fix this up.  Let me know if that helps!
